p: In order to analyze the chemical composition and antimicrobial and antileishmanial activity of C. zeylanicum, O. vulgare, and C. longa essential oils, we evaluated the chemical constituents, activity against E. coli, S. aureus, and P. aeruginosa, activity against promastigote and intracellular amastigote of L. amazonensis, and cytotoxicity in BALB/c peritoneal macrophage.
